title: To the Kings most excellent Maiestie. The humble petition and information of Sir Lewis Stucley, Knight, Vice-admirall of Deuon, touching his owne behauiour in the charge committed vnto him, for the bringing vp of Sir Walter Raleigh, and the scandalous aspersions cast vpon him for the same
author: Stucley, Lewis, Sir, d. 1620.
publicationStmtPublisher: By Bonham Norton and Iohn Bill, printers to the Kings most excellent Maiestie,
